CSSFunctionRule.summary: NOTE Experimental The CSSFunctionRule interface of the CSS Object Model represents CSS @function (custom function) at-rules.

CSSFunctionRuleGetParameters.summary: NOTE Experimental The getParameters() method of the interface returns an array of objects representing the custom function's parameters.
CSSFunctionRuleGetParameters.returns: An array of objects containing the following properties:If no parameters were specified in the associated @function at-rule, an empty array is returned.

CSSFunctionRuleName.summary: NOTE Experimental The name property of the interface returns a string representing the custom function's name.

CSSFunctionRuleReturnType.summary: NOTE Experimental The returnType property of the interface returns a string representing the custom function's return type.
CSSFunctionRuleReturnType.value: A string.If no return type is specified in the associated @function at-rule, returnType returns *.
